channel.title: MySQL on Wandering Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on Wandering Thoughts

item.title: Logging requests with MySQL
item.description: Trying to setup a simple activity log using MySQL? Using this techniquie it's easy to get a count of actions performed on your site.

item.title: MySQL - on duplicate key update
item.description: Using "ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE" can be very useful when migrating data or logging to a MySQL database.
